meanings.sent1: The conglomeratic rocks in the area were a mix of different materials.
meanings.sent2: The geologist studied the conglomeratic formations to understand their composition.
meanings.sent3: The artist created a conglomeratic sculpture using various types of clay.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like conglomeratic pieces, a mix of memories and dreams.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky in a conglomeratic blend of colors.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to or characteristic of a conglomerate.
meanings.sent1: The conglomeratic nature of the project required collaboration from multiple teams.
meanings.sent2: His speech had a conglomeratic structure, touching on various topics.
meanings.sent3: The party was a conglomeratic mix of music, food, and games.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was as conglomeratic as a mosaic of different traits.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a conglomeratic display of flowers in different colors.

meanings.definition: Composed of fragments of various rocks or minerals cemented together.
meanings.sent1: The conglomeratic rock formation showed layers of different materials.
meanings.sent2: The path was made of conglomeratic stones, each with a unique color.
meanings.sent3: The cake was a conglomeratic mix of chocolate, vanilla, and strawberry layers.
meanings.sent4: His speech was a conglomeratic blend of quotes from different authors.
meanings.sent5: The mosaic artwork was a conglomeratic masterpiece of tiny colored stones.
